Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.component

Interface ITemporaryStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    public interface ITemporaryStorage
extends IComponent
    Temporary storage is used to deliver items to players reliably. Usually, when giving items to players, they can be drop at the player's location, put into a player's inventory or ender chest. But the player may be in a danger zone (e.g. swimming in lava) or the inventories could be full.

    Temporary storage is designed to be a safe place with unlimited capacity so players need no more to worry about losing their items.

    See https://github.com/NyaaCat/HamsterEcoHelper/blob/master/src/main/java/cat/nyaa/HamsterEcoHelper/utils/database/Database.java#L75

        Get stored items for a player. Can be an empty list.

      • hasStoredItem

        default boolean hasStoredItem​(OfflinePlayer player)
        Check if the player has stored items
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:

        Reset a player's stored item list
        Parameters:

        Returns:
